channel.title: Summer Vacation!
channel.description:
It's summer vacation everyone! This summer is going to be great, I'm going to a hockey camp all week long in July. For the 4th
of July I'll be at Cape Cod. There's also a beach called Misquamicut and the waves are three times my size, I'll be going there
also. What are you guys doing?

item.title: Summer Vacation!
item.dc:creator: @laurent_248 laurent 248
item.description:
@laurent_248 wrote:

qawsedrftgyhujikol:

Football practice all summer. Got football camp July 14th - 16th.

That’s awesome! I love football

item.title: Summer Vacation!
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

Went on vacation with my girlfriend to South Carolina. Was real nice. Love the ocean. Everyday we had free reign and I slept in til 11. Everything was within walking distance of the hotel so it was really relaxing. I really loved it.

Read full topic

item.title: Summer Vacation!
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

Yeah, east cost United States.

I’ve been watching movies, hanging and walking with friends, hanging out with girlfriend. To be honest, I like what Andrew likes, I hate summer though I do hate school, I still can’t stand summer because it’s boring as Hell.

For the most part though, mother plans on collecting some cash and plans on going to South Carolina.

Read full topic

item.title: Summer Vacation!

item.description:
@Marine5287 wrote:

The main reason of this thread is to see what interesting things people were doing this summer, not if you’re bored or when you

got out. Although those can be included in your reply.

item.title: Summer Vacation!
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

[quote=“SilentCJ, post:13, topic:400318”][quote author=Andrew Ferguson link=topic=497392.msg3637154#msg3637154 date=1308678608]

I’m off from college in 2 weeks, then I’m off to turkey for 2 weeks and a bit, ye bitches.

What are you studying? I’m working on a criminal justice degree with a minor in computer science.
[/quote]
Nerdiest course ever, the ICT diploma, 4 days a week full of ICT
Equivalent to 3.5 A Levels etc.[/quote]
Wow, you have a much stronger attention span then me. I would never be able to sit threw that.

Read full topic

item.title: Summer Vacation!
item.dc:creator: @Marine5287 Marine5287

Wow smart people.

item.title: Summer Vacation!
item.dc:creator: @marcbob marcbob
item.description:
@marcbob wrote:

I honestly would rather have the one school schedule where they go to school for like 8 weeks and then get 2 weeks off. I’m not to the point where i’m bored of summer quite yet. I’m still doing stuff with friends but after I feel like I just wasted a day.

Read full topic

item.title: Summer Vacation!
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

[quote=“Marine5287, post:8, topic:400318”][quote author=Andrew Ferguson link=topic=497392.msg3637140#msg3637140 date=1308678237]
Tbh I hate summer, winter is my time to shine. Its almost a month into summer for me and all I have done is work 16 hour shifts for weeks strait and watch movies with my friends and girlfriend. It just sucks though cause I need to save up for my classes for next year so I have to work like crazy and I almost never get to see my family.
[/quote]

You don’t get any vacation days?[/quote]
I cant afford too, my parents were going to be paying for my classes (my family is rather well off) but I had a big argument with my father a few months back that I don’t want to get into so basically I’m on my own for all my funding if I ever want to finish.

SilentCJ:

I’m off from college in 2 weeks, then I’m off to turkey for 2 weeks and a bit, ye bitches.

What are you studying? I’m working on a criminal justice degree with a minor in computer science.

Read full topic
